review: Pros :- Completely digital bank with great offers for savings accounts, fixed deposits etc. The app is good and robust, much better than many other banking apps ! Cons :- Digibot is of no help at all ! Bill payments options should include UPI & Debit Card aside from Savings Account ! And why would I pay any charges for ATM withdrawals at all when DBS don't have any ATMs at all !! Finally you should integrate the digibucks program in the App also, so that FAQ and scorecard can be checked therein !
